duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate existing and/or new sales related to gene editing for therapeutics for assigned named accounts or assigned geographic, territory, industry or accounts list.
Identify and recruit strategic partners to embed and/or resell company products.
Promote and sell manufacturing services and/or solutions to current or new customers/partners and inform customers of new service capabilities.
Create, monitor, and revise lead generation plans.
Develop customers and maintain their satisfaction.
Maintain positive ongoing long-term relationships with key customers.
Understand customer needs and identify solutions to non-standard tasks/queries.
Lead projects requiring coordination with other functions and organizations.
Solve a broad range of problems of varying scope and complexity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree or University Degree or equivalent
